item.title: Carmakers Step in With Incentives as EV Tax Credit Expires
item.description: As the federal government ends its EV tax credit, legacy automakers have moved to offer their own incentives to keep EV sales rolling.

item.title: Buy the Dip? Zillow’s Profit Comeback Meets Market Pressure
item.description: Zillow stock faces pressure from an FTC lawsuit despite strong mortgage growth and a return to profitability for the first time in over a decade

item.title: Don’t Miss These 3 Hidden Aerospace Gems Before They Take Off
item.description: Three relatively unknown aerospace companies could be in for big gains, but they also present some risks that investors should consider.
